item.title: DISA | News
item.description:
Defense Information Systems Agency news and information about agency events. 
@@ -11,6 +11,10 @@
 

 

 
August 2025

+
               [DISA leverages Johns Hopkins University innovation to enhance military capabilities ](/NewsandEvents/2025/0818-DISA-Leverages-Johns-Hopkins)

+
08/18/2025

+
               DISA's contract with Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory (APL) provides the Department of Defense with critical, rapid, and cost-effective technology solutions to enhance battlefield readiness.

+

 
               [DISA Pacific welcomes new commander in USS Missouri ceremony](/NewsandEvents/2025/0805-DISA-PAC-CoC)

 
08/05/2025

 
               Marine Corps Col. Michael T. Hlad assumes command of DISA Pacific in a ceremony aboard the USS Missouri, succeeding Col. Jared C. Voneida.

@@ -95,10 +99,5 @@
 
02/04/2025

 
               Christopher Barnhurst, Defense Information Systems Agency deputy director spoke at the AFCEA DC luncheon where he emphasized the agency's pivotal role in national security and its strong reliance on partnerships with private industry.

 

-
January 2025

-
               [DISA announces new social media handles](/NewsandEvents/2025/0113-DISA-new-social-handles)

-
01/13/2025

-
               This change improves search functionality and auto-population when users search for “DISA” on social media. It is also a part of our effort to ensure clear communication, transparency and accessibility with our audience.

-
